topic: With rise in temperature, Bihar reports more cases of acute encephalitis syndrome among kids
description: Muzaffarpur, Vaishali, Sitamarhi, East Champaran and Samastipur in north Bihar have been identified as worst-affected by the AES.
Children showing symptoms of Acute Encephalitis Syndrome undergo treatment at a hospital in Muzaffarpur.
Two children with symptoms of AES have been admitted to Sri Krishna Medical College and Hospital (SKMCH) in Muzaffarpur in the last three days.

They have been admitted to the preventive intensive care unit ward and are under close observation of a senior doctor of the hospital," said Dr Gopal Shanker Sahani, head of paediatrics department of SKMCH.
The SKMCH has already earmarked 100 beds for AES patients.
On Monday, the hospital released a roaster of 30 doctors to deal with the AES cases, which have started being reported with the rise in summer temperature.
